requirements: During the course of completing a single challenge, break Bronzelock's core 3 times.
Defeat Bronzelock after Bronzelock has increased RES to 4 different Elemental Types.
Defeat Rilai while Rilai is using "Fusion Nova."
Defeat Rilai while Rilai is using "Fusion Nova" and without being hit by the attacks.
Defeat Local Legend: Spirit of the Fallen Dawnstar.
Defeat Spirit of the Fallen Dawnstar without ever having thawed the frozen torch.
Defeat Spirit of the Fallen Dawnstar without ever having been hit by the Obsidian Storm.
During the course of completing a single challenge, fully restore the HP of each and every Protection Spirit.
During the course of completing a single challenge, no characters were downed and have Protection Spirit use "Decisive: Binding of Dawn and Dusk's Breaking."
During the course of completing a single challenge, no characters were downed.
Defeat Tupayo's Aid while they are hovering in the air.
Defeat Ironbeard without ever letting Ironbeard break Molten Barbs.
Defeat Ironbeard without being hit by any of Ironbeard's attacks.
